title: Life Cycle
description: This schema defines Life Cycle Properties.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of data asset for creation, update, valid, available.

madeBy.description: User/Organization, Process that created, updated, ... the data asset

created.description: Details about created aspect of the data asset

updated.description: Details about updated aspect of the data asset

validTo.description: The timestamp indicating when the data becomes valid.

availableTo.description: The timestamp indicating when the data becomes available for use.
